item.title: 10 Best torrent websites
item.description:
10 Best torrent websites

Latest Posts

10 Best torrent websites

10 Bollywood Stars with Different Past

Top 10 Richest Indians(2016)

Summary:- Some people consider torrents to be bad while for some people it has became an integral part of their life.Whaterver might be the truth there is no denying the fact that they have had a huge impact on the society.Let's see list of top 10 websites offering torrents.
10. IsoHunt

Summary:- IsoTorrent was taken down a few years ago due to copyright infrindgement but since then mirrors of the site have come up among which the most prominent one is isohunt.to . Isohunt indexes large number of torrents from all the caregories and its sleek design makes it more user friendly.
link:- IsoHunt

9. GloTorrents

Summary:- GloTorrents might not be as old as some of the other sites on this list, but it is surely rising up the ranks with very large amount of indexed torrents in a very short time and with a lot of Indian content as well.
link:- GloTorrents

8. ExtraTorrent

Summary:- ExtraTorrent is a nice site for downloading any type of torrent.But what makes it better than others is the growing community and forums which helps in getting the best torrent avaliable.
link:- ExtraTorrent

7. TorLock

Summary:- TorLock has total 35 lakh verified torrents while publishing this article and updates 600-1000 torrents per day.It has a nice and user friendly design.
link:- TorLock

6. 1337X

Summary:- while 1337X has a large database of torrents and a good interface it fails to have a good community or torrent verification thats why it sits on the 6th position on our list.
link:- 1337X

5. TorrentZ

Summary:- While Torrentz is not a torrent hosting website it was a huge meta-search engine for torrent which compiled the torrents of all major websites and also sorted them.Until it went down in 2016.But don't worry ,mirrors of this website have come up to the rescue.
link:- TorrentZ

4. YTS(yify)

Summary:- Though yify went down some time ago due to copyright issues,It is and always will be a legendary website.It specialized in Movie torrents with all HD movies and that too with very low file size.Recently a mirror of this website popped up, while the quality remains the same ,major amount movies uploaded there are quite old and shitty I hope they look into that.
link:- YTS

3. EZTV

Summary:- While this site remains unknown to many to is arguably the best site for TV Torrents.Since its inception it has made sure to be the first one to upload TV Torrents and has torrent for all types of TV shows.
link:- EZTV

2. KickassTorrents

Summary:- KickassTorrents had a huge community and large amount of indexed torrents, any user can easily find any torrent they want very easily with its rating system and sorting tools.while it was shut down its mirrors are avaliable.
link:- KickassTorrents

1. The Pirate Bay

Summary:- Ranked 198 in Alexa Traffic Rank,One of the foremost websites to host a torrent, The Pirate Bay is a one stop place for all your torrents.If you are unable to find a torrent on any other site due to removal because of copyright infrindgement ,you can find that torrent here because of TPB's non compliance with DMCA.The authorities keep shutting down TPB but another mirror popsup instantly.
link:- The Pirate Bay

item.title: 10 Bollywood Stars with Different Past
item.description:
10 Bollywood Stars with Different Past

Latest Posts

10 Best torrent websites

10 Bollywood Stars with Different Past

Top 10 Richest Indians(2016)

Summary:- They were not handed silver spoon of acting but made it to the industry on their own with their exceptional talent. Let's see some of the Bollywood stars who had their fair share of stints in other industries before joining Bollywood.
10. R Madhavan

Early Days:- Madhavan graduated with a degree in electronics.During his college years, Madhavan was actively involved in extra-curricular military training and regarded among the best NCC cadets and during this time took training with British Army, the Royal Navy he wanted to join Royal Air Force but missed the age cutoff.He began teaching courses in public speaking.
Movies:- Tanu Weds Manu,3 Idiots,Rehna Hai Tere Dil Mein.

9. John Abraham

Early Days:- John Abraham started his modelling career appearing in the music videos .Later on he joined and worked for different AD agencies .
Movies:- Dhoom,Madras Cafe,Dostana

8. Jacqueline Fernandez

Early Days:- Jacqueline used to host television shows in Bahrain when she was 14.She has a degree in mass communication.After graduating she worked as a television reporter in Sri Lanka and at the same time she pursued modelling and won Miss Universe Sri Lanka pageant in 2006.
Movies:- Housefull,Kick,Murder 2.

7. Parineeti Chopra

Early Days:- Parineeti wanted to become an investment banker during her early days.At the age of 17, she moved to London, where she received a triple honours degree in business, finance and economics from Manchester Business School.While studying, she also worked part-time for the Manchester United Football Club as the team leader of the catering department.Later on she became marketting Professional.
Movies:- Ladies vs Ricky Bahl,Ishaqzaade,Shuddh Desi Romance.

6. Akshay Kumar

Early Days:- He obtained his black belt in Taekwondo in India.After that he went to Bangkok, Thailand to learn Muay Thai while at the same time he worked as a chef and waiter.He came back to India to Teach Martial Arts.
Movies:- Khiladi,Singh Is Kinng,Hera Pheri

5. Sushant Singh Rajput

Early Days:- Sushant Singh was a very intelligent student he was a national Olympiad winner in Physics.In his 12th standard board exams, he secured AIR-7 in AIEEE (All-India Rank-7 in the All India Engineering Entrance Exam) and cleared many enterance exams. He was pursuing engineering in DTU but later droped out to become an actor.
Movies:- Kai Po Che,Detective Byomkesh Bakshy!,M. S. Dhoni: The Untold Story

4. Boman Irani

Early Days:- After his polytechnic diploma course, he joined the Taj Mahal Palace & Tower and worked there as a waiter and room service staff.Thereafter, he joined his mother to run their ancestral bakery shop.He began acting very late in his life.
Movies:- Munnabhai M.B.B.S.,Khosla Ka Ghosla,Ferrari Ki Sawaari

3. Nawazuddin Siddiqui

Early Days:- He has graduated with a Bachelor of Science degree in Chemistry.Following this, he worked as a chemist in Vadodara for a year and has also worked as a Guard.
Movies:- Gangs of Wasseypur,Badlapur,Manjhi - The Mountain Man

2. Mehmood Ali

Early Days:- Mehmood did many odd jobs before getting into mainline acting like working as a table tennis teacher,as a driver -to name a few.
Movies:- Bhoot Bangla,Padosan,Bombay to Goa

1. Shivaji Rao Gaekwad(Rajnikanth)

Early Days:- After completing his school education ,Rajnikanth did many jobs including that of a coolie,carpenter and later on became a bus conductor at the same time he took part in several stage plays.
Movies:- Phool Bane Angaray,Sivaji - The Boss,Robot.

item.title: 10 Awesome Childhood Animes
item.description:
10 Awesome Childhood Animes

Latest Posts

10 Best torrent websites

10 Bollywood Stars with Different Past

Top 10 Richest Indians(2016)

Summary:- we've all had so much fun in our childhood watching cartoons, they have made a place in our hearts which can never be erased.Let's see some of the best of our childhood animes.
10. Kochikame

10.Kochikame

Kochikame ,is a Japanese comedy manga series written and illustrated by Osamu Akimoto and revolves around the misadventures of middle-aged cop Kankichi Ryotsu.

Since its inception on September 1976 it has over 1800 chapters collected into 199 tankobon volumes, making it the manga series with the highest number of volumes. The manga has been adapted into a television anime series two theatrical animated films, two live-action movies, several stage adaptations, and a live-action television series.

TV Asahi named the anime number 36 on its list of the Top 100 Anime.


9. Shinchan

9.shinchan

Laugh to hide your tears... He’s rude. He’s crass. He’s unbelievably obnoxious and he likes to take off clothes when dances, he is Shin Chan.

This anime is about a 6 years old cute kid name Shin-chan Nohara who lives with is mom , dad and his pet dog Shiro, and he loves watching Action Kamen.But don't go by the looks of this kid Shin Chan is a naughty boy who gives everyone trouble but at the same time he is too cute to be mad at.

Shin Chan doesn't like Capsicum


8. Doraemon

8.Doraemon

Doraemon TV series is based on the manga by team Fujiko Fujio.First published in December 1969 this anime has been recognised as one of the most popular anime of all time.

Doraemon is about a futuristic robot cat who is there to help a pre-teen kid named Nobita.This anime is packed with futuristic gadgets,funny storyline and cool songs

Doraemon had a pair of ears, but lost it to rats that bit off them off


7.Ninja Hattori

7.Ninja Hattori

Ninja Hattori-kun, known as Ninja Hattori in some countries, is a manga series created by Motoo Abiko, later adapted into a television drama, an anime series

Kenichi Mitsuba is an average kid who goes to secondary school and struggles with his studies, he is very stubborn and is very lazy but he takes the help of his ninja friend Hattori Kanzo to get out of any difficult situation.

This anime was remade as a 2013 anime series as a joint venture between India and Japan and is currently on the air in several Asian countries.


6.Digimon

6.Digimon

This franchise was first created in 1997 as a series of virtual pets(Digimon),which are monsters living in a "Digital World, a parallel universe that originated from Earth's various communication networks.

A group of young teens is unexpectedly sent to the mysterious Digital World and paired up with their own powerful, morphing monster called the Digimon. Together the entire group set out on an adventure to fight evil and save the world.

Almost all villains in Digimon Adventure come back at least one more time after the presumed death.


5.Yu-Gi-Oh

5.Yu-Gi-Oh

Yu-Gi-Oh! (1998) is the first anime adaptation of the popular manga by Kazuki Takahashi.

Yugi Mutou is a shy young boy who has finally completed his grandfather's Thousand-Year puzzle. Little does he realize that this puzzle unleashes an alter ego.Yu-Gi-Oh is on his way to to become the best dual master of monster cards and his alter ego and his friends help him on his way.

In Japanese, Yu-Gi-Oh means King of Games.


4.Naruto

4.Naruto

The series is based on a one-shot manga by Kishimoto that was published in the August 1997 issue of Akamaru Jump.

Follows the struggles of three young ninjas - Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha and Sakura Haruno - as they go through their training.Naruto has a sealed demon fox(nine tails) inside him, he grew up with no family, and the villagers hated him thinking that he himself was the demon fox. Naruto's dream is to become Hokage, and have the villagers acknowledge him.

The voice actors doing the voice of Naruto both in English and Japanese are both female.


3.Dragonball-Z

3.Dragonball-Z

Dragon Ball manga series was created by Akira Toriyama, that were published from 1988 to 1995 in Weekly Shonen Jump.

After learning that he is from another planet, a warrior named Goku and his friends are prompted to defend it from an onslaught of extraterrestrial enemies.

Freeza and Goku's fight in Namek is the longest battle in anime history, with a duration of a little over four hours


2.Beyblade

2.Beyblade

Four beybladers and their genius friend travel the world as team 'Bladebreakers' to win a championship, realizing there's much more at stake on the go.

In these battles, everyone has his/her special moves and have some special type of Beyblade like Tyson which has Dragoon type beyblade beast. Everyone wants to become best of all.What made it more interesting is that people could buy a beyblade have matches with friends and connect even more with the anime

The Bladebreakers' bit-beasts are based on the 4 Chinese Gods which are: Dragoon - Seriyu the Dragon, Dranzer - Suzaku the Phoenix, Draciel - Genbu the Turtle and Driger - Byako the Tiger


1.Pokemon

1.Pokemon

The adventures of Ash Ketchum and his partner Pikachu, who travel across many regions in hopes of being regarded as a Pokemon master.

Ten-year-old Ash aspires to be the greatest Pokémon (pocket monster) trainer in the world. To do this, he enlists the help of two friends, Misty and Brock, and his own Pokémon, Pikachu. Together, they must search their world for all 150 Pokémon, while avoiding the likes of Team Rocket and their Pokémon, Meowth.

The names of two Pokemon, Ekans and Arbok, are reversed words.
